tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(50),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_adjustments (
    adjustment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    adjustment_type VARCHAR(50),
    adjustment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    adjustment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE real_time_ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    roi DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_click_history (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    device_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversion_rate FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
  click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_id INT,
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  clicked_url VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255),
  ad_type VARCHAR(50),
  clicks INT,
  impressions INT
);
